message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. It's a fair deal considering the inflation will affect you much more than me.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split.  This accounts for the inflation impact while still offering you a significant sum.
I'm willing to compromise further, but 65/35 is my final offer.  Let's end this, as the inflation is hurting us both.
